text: tara allah‌ra sapatha kare ye, tara kichu baleni [1]; athaca tara to kuphari bakya baleche ebam isalama grahanera para tara kuphari kareche; ara tara emana kichura sankalpa karechila ya tara payani. Ara allah‌ o tamra rasula nija anugrahe taderake abhabamukta karechilena bale'i tara birodhita karechila [2]. Atahpara tara ta'obah karale ta tadera jan'ya bhala habe, ara tara mukha phiriye nile allah‌ duniya o akherate taderake yantranadayaka sasti debena; ara yamine tadera kono abhibhabaka ne'i ebam kono sahayyakari'o ne'i
